data: “What am I gwine to do wid dese yere barkers, Colonel?” asked Chad, picking up his master’s case of duelling pistols from the mantel.
"What am I gwine to do wid dese yere barkers, Colonel?" asked Chad, picking up his master's case of duelling pistols from the mantel.
Colonel Carter's Christmas and The Romance of an Old-Fashioned Gentleman
Smith, Francis Hopkinson, 1838-1915; Keller, Arthur Ignatius, 1866-1924 [Illustrator]; Yohn, F. C. (Frederick Coffay), 1875-1933 [Illustrator]
